Savage Sting.name: Savage Sting
Savage Sting.flavor: Your shot pierces your foe, creating a grievous wound that hampers your enemy.
Savage Sting.onHit:
3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and ongoing 5 damage (save ends).
Level 21: Ongoing 10 damage (save ends).

Deadly Swarm.name: Deadly Swarm
Deadly Swarm.flavor: Your shots overwhelm your foes, making them susceptible to other adverse effects.
Deadly Swarm.target: One, two, three, or four creatures
Deadly Swarm.onHit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target takes a –2 penalty to saving throws until the end of your next turn.

Wasp's Evasion.name: Wasp's Evasion
Wasp's Evasion.flavor: You duck and weave as if riding an air current, avoiding the full force of your enemies’ blows.
Wasp's Evasion.trigger: An enemy hits you with a melee or a ranged attack
Wasp's Evasion.effect: You take half damage from melee and ranged attacks until the end of your next turn.
